recentPublications.title: Physics for the Sake of Security, Security for the Sake of Physics: A Survey of Physics-Based Security in Cyber-Physical Systems
recentPublications.venue: IEEE Transactions on Dependable and Secure Computing
recentPublications.abstract: This survey examines the bidirectional relationship between physics-based approaches and security in cyber-physical systems, providing a comprehensive taxonomy of physics-informed security mechanisms.

recentPublications.title: Towards Trustworthy AI in Cyber-Physical Systems: Integrating Symbolic Knowledge with Deep Learning
recentPublications.venue: Proceedings of the 2022 ACM SIGSAC Conference on Computer and Communications Security (CCS)
recentPublications.abstract: We present a novel framework for integrating symbolic domain knowledge with deep learning models in cyber-physical systems to enhance trustworthiness and interpretability while maintaining performance.

recentPublications.title: Semantic Retrofitting of Legacy Industrial Control Systems for Enhanced Security
recentPublications.abstract: This work demonstrates how semantic analysis of physical processes can be leveraged to retrofit security mechanisms in legacy industrial control systems without requiring hardware modifications.

recentPublications.title: Secure Programming Abstractions for Ubiquitous IoT Sensing
recentPublications.abstract: We introduce novel programming abstractions that enable developers to create secure IoT sensing applications while ensuring privacy guarantees through information flow control.

recentPublications.title: Formal Verification of Programmable Logic Controllers in Cyber-Physical Systems
recentPublications.abstract: We present formal verification techniques for programmable logic controllers using differential dynamic logic, enabling automated verification of safety properties in industrial control systems.
